mapper.select: select c.comment_Id , c.board_Id , c.guest_nickname , c.comment_content , c.comment_register_date , u.nickname from comment c left join user u on u.user_id = c.user_id where board_id=#{boardId};
mapper.insert: insert into comment(board_id, user_id, comment_content) values(#{boardId}, #{userId}, #{commentContent})
insert into comment(board_id, guest_nickname, guest_password, comment_content) values(#{boardId}, #{guestNickname}, #{guestPassword}, #{commentContent})
